Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item carries a significant value to us, reflecting its quality, functionality, and uniqueness. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we're extending an exclusive offer to you. We're proposing to sell this remarkable product to you for $12000. We believe this price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also provides you with an opportunity to acquire something truly special at a competitive rate. We're confident it will exceed your expectations and bring you immense satisfaction. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
